children.value: This plugin is designed for use with
which are built on top of
. It is highly recommended that you use this plugin with packages like
if you want your server to shut down gracefully.
You do not need to explicitly use this plugin with the batteries-included
package: that package automatically uses this plugin internally.
When you use this plugin, Apollo Server will drain your HTTP server when you call the
method (which is also called for you when the
signals are received, unless disabled with the
Close idle connections (i.e., connections with no current HTTP request)
Close active connections whenever they become idle
Wait for all connections to be closed
After a grace period, if any connections remain active, forcefully close them.

. (If you're using Hapi, you should instead use the
